Точнее - это несколько болезней связанны: To be precise, this is the combination of several diseases associated with the following anomalies in the organism
Нарушение чувства насыщения пищей – ‘гол: Violation of food satiation so called "Starved Brain"
Недостаточная послепищевая сытость – ‘го: Insufficient of post-meal satiety so called "Starved Gut"
Аномальная эмоциональная реакция на пищу: Abnormal emotional reaction to food so called "Emotional Hunger"
Наше приложение OBESITEST позволяет диаг: Our OBESITEST app allows you to diagnose these abnormalities and treat them in a personalized manner, delivering long-term and sustainable weight loss of 7 to 8 percent.
Самое главное, наш подход признан нормал: Our approach is directed to normalize the functions of the cardiovascular system, liver, kidneys, pancreas, brain and other organs, the violation of which often accompanies obesity.
Индекс массы тела позволяет оценить соот: Body mass index allows  to evaluate the consistency of your height and weight. By calculating it, we will understand whether your weight is normal, overweight or, conversely, underweight. This indicator is important, in particular, for correcting diet.
Существует общепринятая формула, по кото: There is a generally accepted formula by which the index is calculated. You need to divide your weight in kilograms by your height squared.
Чтобы рассчитать индекс массы тела для ж: If you want to calculate your body mass index for women and men using the online calculator, enter your height and weight into two cells, specifying your height in centimeters and your weight in kilograms. You will receive the result instantly - the index is calculated automatically.
Фенотип аномальной эмоциональной реакции: Abnormal emotional reaction to food phenotype
Подумайте о ваших обычных ощущениях голо: Think about your usual hunger sensations BEFORE you usually eat at home.
Установите бегунок на линейной шкале в т: Set the slider on the linear scale to the place that corresponds to your usual feeling of hunger before a regular meal
Совершенно не ощущаю: I don’t feel it at all
Подумайте о ваших обычных ощущениях полн: Think about your usual fullness in your stomach AFTER a usual meal at home.
Установите бегунок на линейной шкале в т: Set the slider on the linear scale to the place that corresponds to your usual feeling of fullness in your stomach after a usual meal at home
Насколько вы ощущаете полноту в желудке?: How full do you feel in your stomach?
Подумайте о ваших обычных ощущениях полн: Think about your usual feeling of fullness in your stomach TWO HOURS after eating a usual meal at home.
Установите бегунок на линейной шкале в т: Set the slider on the linear scale to the point that corresponds to your normal feeling of fullness in your stomach TWO HOURS after your usual meal at home.
Диагностика данного вида аномалий основа: Diagnosis of these type of anomalies is based on the assessment of the psychological reaction to positive or negative emotions associated with the desire to frequently eat snacks in the intervals between main meals.
Для этого используется шкала тревоги и д: For this purpose, the Anxiety and Depression Scale is used.
Внимательно подумайте над каждым вопросо: Think carefully about each question and choose one answer.
Диагностика нарушений, связанных со сниж: Diagnosis of disorders associated with a decrease in the rate of metabolism, as a result of which the energy supplied from food is unevenly distributed in the body, supplying muscles to a lesser extent and accumulating in adipose tissue.
Для данного вида диагностики после 8-час: Аfter an 8-hour overnight fast (in the morning on an empty stomach), it is necessary to undergo Bioelectrical impedance analysis - an analysis of the amount of fat and fluid in the body, muscle and bone mass and metabolism. This can be done using the InBody 770 or 970.
Общее заключение по оценке фенотипа ожир: General conclusion for assessing the obesity phenotype
